snippet: A family of four will have to pay an estimated $641.50 to attend a 49ers game in their new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif.
abstract: NFL Roundup; San Francisco 49ers’ new stadium is the most expensive to take a family of four to for an NFL game; Team Marketing Report releases its Fan Cost Index which shows that families will have to pay an estimated $641.50 to attend a 49ers game in their new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A family of four will have to pay an estimated $641.50 to attend a 49ers game in their new stadium in Santa Clara, Calif.
